statements: SELECT * FROM SupplierInventory;
SELECT product_name, current_inventory FROM SupplierInventory WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, current_inventory FROM SupplierInventory WHERE current_inventory < 10;
SELECT * FROM SupplierInventory ORDER BY current_inventory DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, product_name, current_inventory FROM SupplierInventory WHERE reorder_threshold < current_inventory;
SELECT product_name, current_inventory FROM SupplierInventory WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM SupplierInventory WHERE current_inventory < reorder_threshold ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, product_id, current_inventory FROM SupplierInventory WHERE current_inventory > 50 ORDER BY supplier_id ASC;
SELECT product_name, reorder_threshold FROM SupplierInventory WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND current_inventory < 20;
SELECT * FROM SupplierInventory WHERE current_inventory = (SELECT MAX(current_inventory) FROM SupplierInventory);
SELECT * FROM supplier_inventory WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, current_quantity FROM supplier_inventory WHERE current_quantity < 20;
SELECT supplier_id, product_id, current_quantity FROM supplier_inventory ORDER BY current_quantity DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, product_id, current_quantity, reorder_threshold FROM supplier_inventory WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM reorder_alerts ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_inventory WHERE current_quantity < reorder_threshold ORDER BY supplier_id ASC, current_quantity DESC
SELECT supplier_id, product_id, current_quantity FROM supplier_inventory WHERE current_quantity > 100 ORDER BY current_quantity DESC, supplier_id ASC
SELECT supplier_id, product_id, current_quantity FROM supplier_inventory WHERE current_quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY current_quantity ASC, supplier_id DESC
SELECT supplier_id, product_id, current_quantity, reorder_threshold FROM supplier_inventory WHERE reorder_threshold > current_quantity ORDER BY supplier_id DESC
SELECT * FROM reorder_alerts WHERE alert_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM supplier;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM supplier ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM supplier WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, quantity FROM product WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, s.supplier_name, i.quantity_in_stock FROM product p JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id JOIN supplier s ON i.supplier_id = s.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM supplier;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM supplier ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM supplier WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM product WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM supplier s JOIN inventory i ON s.supplier_id = i.supplier_id ORDER BY quantity_in_stock DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_phone FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50 ORDER BY product_price ASC;
SELECT inventory_id, stock_quantity, reorder_threshold FROM inventory WHERE reorder_threshold < 10;
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_phone LIKE '+1%';
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, product_price FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id WHERE products.product_price > 100;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%');
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT * FROM supplier;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM supplier;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM product ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_phone FROM supplier WHERE supplier_email LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT product_name, product_quantity FROM product WHERE product_quantity < 10;
SELECT * FROM supplier ORDER BY supplier_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM supplier WHERE supplier_phone LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY supplier_email ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM product WHERE product_quantity > 0 ORDER BY product_price DESC;

SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email, product_name, stock_level FROM supplier s JOIN inventory i ON s.supplier_id = i.supplier_id JOIN product p ON i.product_id = p.product_id WHERE stock_level < 50 ORDER BY supplier_name, product_name ASC;

SELECT r.threshold_id, p.product_name, r.min_stock_level, r.reorder_quantity FROM reorder_threshold r JOIN product p ON r.product_id = p.product_id WHERE r.reorder_quantity > 10 ORDER BY r.min_stock_level ASC, r.reorder_quantity DESC;
